item.title: Report I-2024120020
item.description:
Report I-2024120020

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-06T12:24:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-04
  • City: Morton
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PVS TRANSPORTATION, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PVS Transportation driver was filling the second of 3 tanks when product started coming out the top. Product came down mainly into containment. Some product splashed onto the top of the containment wall and next to containment. Driver and operator on site performed cleanup. Tank 2 has a gauge but it appears it was not working operator told him to fill to 5940, but it overflowed when it read 5541. Operator on site was monitoring the gauge during the fill. No Injures or Exposures.
